name: maker-management-platform
tagline: An ERP platform for managing production inventory and workflows
description: Maker Agent is part of an open-source ERP platform for makers and small businesses. It automates purchase orders, production workflows, and inventory movement and runs via self-hosted web infrastructure.

features.title: Purchase Order Automation
features.description: Generate and track purchase orders for materials and components automatically

features.title: Production Workflows
features.description: Define and manage manufacturing processes with task dependencies and scheduling

features.title: Bill Of Materials
features.description: Create and maintain BOMs for products with component requirements and quantities

features.title: Supplier Management
features.description: Track vendor information, pricing, lead times, and order history

features.title: Work Order System
features.description: Create production jobs with resource allocation and progress tracking
